category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_recyclate_validation
preference.preference_description: Enables the validation of the Recyclate information for the Material Classification as defined by the preference "IMDS_Recyclate_Material_Classification_IDs". The validation is performed by Teamcenter before uploading objects to the International Material Data System (IMDS). The default value is "true"
